title: Stripe
meta_description: A visual helper for the 7 requirements needed for a Stripe account password on their website and mobile app.

sections.name: Requirements
shortcuts: Must be at least 8 characters in length
Must not be an English dictionary word
Must not be a common name or surname
Must not be a 'statistically common' password
Must not be a chain of repeated characters or numbers (99999, aaaaa)
Must not be a sequence of characters or numbers (12345, abcde)

sections.name: Additional Info
shortcuts: Stripe notes that these requirements are only the fundamentals and satisfying them does not guarantee that your password is strong.
